# General Presidency of the National Guard <orig>الرئاسة العامة للحرس الوطني</orig>
## Announcement of Tender No. (3-2024/2025) for the Maintenance, Operation, and Management of Systems for General Presidency Building No. (2)
The General Presidency of the National Guard <orig>الرئاسة العامة للحرس الوطني</orig> announces the issuance of a tender for the operation and management of the National Guard Officers' Club Marina <orig>مرسى نادي ضباط الحرس الوطني</orig> to companies and establishments specialized in this field, in accordance with the conditions stipulated in the tender documents.
Therefore, companies and establishments wishing to participate in this tender must register on the official website of the General Presidency of the National Guard <orig>الرئاسة العامة للحرس الوطني</orig> (www.kng.gov.kw) to purchase the tender documents for a non-refundable fee of (1000/-) K.D. (one thousand Kuwaiti Dinars only). Payment is to be made through the National Guard's electronic website using the (K-NET) service.
A preliminary meeting will be held at 10:00 AM on Monday, 27/01/2025, at the General Presidency of the National Guard <orig>الرئاسة العامة للحرس الوطني</orig> - Directorate of Equipment and Contracts. Bidders, whether present or absent, will be bound by all decisions, recommendations, or clarifications made during the meeting. Specialized companies and establishments participating in the tender must also print the minutes of the preliminary meeting from the official website of the General Presidency of the National Guard <orig>الرئاسة العامة للحرس الوطني</orig> (www.kng.gov.kw).
Please note that the deadline for submitting bids is 1:00 PM on Tuesday, 04/02/2025.
Note:
Companies and establishments wishing to attend the preliminary tender meeting must provide us with a colored copy of their Civil ID. For any inquiries, please call the switchboard at (24999999), extensions: (66983-66769), Fax: (24999858).

- The final deadline for submitting bids is Sunday, 26/01/2025, until 01:00 PM at the Medical Liability Authority <orig>الجهاز المسؤولية الطبية</orig> headquarters.
- A preliminary meeting for companies wishing to participate in the practice will be held on 16/01/2025 at 10:00 AM at the Kuwait Institute for Medical Specializations <orig>معهد الكويت للاختصاصات الطبية</orig> - Fifth Floor - Medical Liability Authority <orig>جهاز المسؤولية الطبية</orig> - Office of the Director of Financial Affairs Department, to answer inquiries.
- The fees for purchasing the booklet are collected via the K-NET device belonging to the Medical Liability Authority <orig>جهاز المسؤولية الطبية</orig> and are considered non-refundable.
- A valid certificate of compliance with the national labor percentage, issued by the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig>, must be submitted with the bid.
- All documents must be submitted on a non-copyable CD, with the exception of the bid format, initial insurance, and the certificate of compliance with the national labor percentage from the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig>, and as an addendum to our announcement published in Issue No. (1714) dated 24/11/2024 of the Official Gazette Kuwait Today / Al-Kuwait Al-Youm <orig>الكويت اليوم</orig>.

## Announcement
## Regarding the Extension of the Qualification Application Period and Pre-Qualification List Updates

The Higher Purchasing Committee <orig>لجنة الشراء العليا</orig> of Kuwait Petroleum Corporation <orig>مؤسسة البترول الكويتية</orig> and its subsidiaries announces to esteemed business partners the extension of the qualification application period and pre-qualification list updates for limited tenders, practices, and direct purchase orders via the unified electronic platform "K-Tendering" for an additional 45 days from the date of this announcement.
This extension aims to provide more time for those wishing to submit their applications to fulfill all announcement requirements according to the specified conditions.

## Call for Qualification and Qualification Update

Based on this extension, the Central Qualification Committee <orig>لجنة التأهيل المركزية</orig> invites all business partners to access the electronic platform
"K-Tendering" via the following link:
https://ktendering.com.kw
to submit qualification applications or update qualifications as follows:
Firstly: Commercial Entities Wishing to Qualify for the First Time
- Submit qualification applications via the unified platform within an additional period not exceeding 45 days from the date of this announcement.
Secondly: Pre-Qualified Commercial Entities
- If more than two years have passed since their qualification, they must submit qualification update applications within an additional period of 45 days from the date of this announcement.
- The application includes the following:
  1. Recent Contracts and Projects: Documents proving the execution of similar works during the last ten years.
  2. Audited Financial Statements (AFS) issued by an independent auditor for the last three years.
  3. Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE) documents in line with the requirements of the work category.

Prequalification Requirements for a Public Tender for the Supply of Gusseted Tube FFS Bag Film Rolls for Polypropylene Product Packaging

1- The supplier must have experience in the supply and manufacturing of packaging bag rolls for polypropylene products, with an experience list attached.
2- The supplier must own a factory in Kuwait or in the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) <orig>مجلس التعاون الخليجي</orig> countries for manufacturing packaging bag rolls for polypropylene products. A commercial registration certificate must be attached.
3- The factory's production capacity for packaging bags must not be less than 700 tons per year. A certificate to that effect must be attached.
4- The factory must include quality laboratories for measuring product specifications.
5- No penalties, sanctions, or violations must have been previously applied against the supplier by Petrochemical Industries Company (PIC) <orig>شركة صناعة الكيماويات البترولية</orig>.
6- The supplier must have their own means of transportation to supply the product to the polypropylene plant.
7- The supplier shall provide Petrochemical Industries Company (PIC) <orig>شركة صناعة الكيماويات البترولية</orig> with a sample of approximately 100 kg that complies with the specifications set by Petrochemical Industries Company (PIC) <orig>شركة صناعة الكيماويات البترولية</orig> for testing 12 days before the closing date. The sample shall be delivered to the company's polypropylene plant in Shuaiba Industrial Area <orig>منطقة الشعيبية الصناعية</orig> through the Equate Petrochemical Company <orig>شركة إيكويت</orig> gate. The supplier shall receive a delivery receipt from Petrochemical Industries Company (PIC) <orig>شركة صناعة الكيماويات البترولية</orig>, and the supplier shall then submit this receipt with the bid form.
8- The Gusseted Tube bag film Requirements checklist for suppliers, attached with the tender documents, must be completed.

The Supplier shall have experience in manufacturing and -1 delivering of Gusseted Tube FFS bag film for Polypropylene product. Customer reference list to be attached.
The Supplier shall have a plant (Factory) for Gusseted Tube -2 bag Film manufacturing in Kuwait or Gulf Cooperation Council Member Countries GCC only. The Supplier must provide the “Commercial Registration Certificate”.
The Plant (factory) has a production capacity of more than -3 700 metric ton/year of Gusseted Tube FFS bag Film. The Supplier must provide the Plant designed capacity data sheet.
The Factory shall have Quality laboratories for product -4 quality analysis.
No penalties or violations have previously been applied -5 against the Supplier by the Petrochemical Industries Company (PIC).
Supplier shall have his own means of transportation to -6 supply the product to Polypropylene plant.
The Supplier shall provide a sample of 100 kg of Gusseted -7 Tube bag film roll that fulfilling Petrochemical Industries Company (PIC) Specification's sheet before 12 days from tender closing date for testing it. The sample to be handed in Polypropylene plant in Shuaiba Industrial Area through Equate Petrochemical Company gate. Petrochemical Industries Company (PIC) shall submit a receipt to the Supplier and the Supplier shall submit this receipt with his bid.
Supplier shall fill the check list of Gusseted Tube bag film -8 Requirements that attached with tender documents.

- This tender is general for all suppliers, non-divisible, provided that the required materials have been approved in the two unified categories of the Central Qualification Committee <orig>اللجنة التأهيل المركزية</orig> as stated in the tender documents.
- Pursuant to Article (29) of Law No. 49 of 2016 <orig>قانون رقم 49 لسنة 2016</orig> concerning Public Tenders <orig>المناقصات العامة</orig>: "No single person or group of persons collectively may register under more than one name during classification or submit more than one bid in a tender, except for alternative bids where the tender conditions permit their submission. As for a person who has a share in separate companies, each independent with its legal personality, finances, engineers, employees, and general administrative apparatus, they may register themselves and each of their independent companies during classification. The bid of a tenderer who violates this article shall be deemed null and void by operation of law."
- The tenderer must deposit the tender document purchase fee into the Kuwait Oil Company <orig>شركة نفط الكويت</orig> account mentioned below, with the necessity of adding the tender number and company name to the purchase receipt issued by the bank and submitting the receipt with the bid. Bids not accompanied by the payment receipt will be excluded. In case of electronic bid submission, a copy of the payment receipt must be attached electronically with the bid.
